SEARCH
Package assignmenttests.classlevel.products.simulation

Class InstantiationAgent

java.lang.Object
assignmenttests.classlevel.products.simulation.InstantiationAgent
public class InstantiationAgent extends Object
The InstantiationAgent class is responsible for detecting instances of a specified class within a given Java file. It checks the fields of a class and searches for instances of the target class, as well as parsing the file to identify class instantiations.

This class uses reflection and the JavaParser library to perform its tasks:

  • It inspects the fields of a given class to find instances of the target class.
  • It parses a Java file to search for variable declarations of the target class type.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private static class 
    InstantiationAgent.VariableVisitor
    A helper class that visits variable declarations in the parsed Java file and checks if any of the variables are of the target class type.
